title: FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns
text:
FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns 2:42pm EST - 01:25 
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops   
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/02/09/farc-suspends-campaign-over-safety-conce?videoId=399891469&videoChannel=13421
